explains: adj. 严厉的；笨手笨脚的；手辣的

sentences.en: Tax rates compare unfavourably with the less heavy-handed North American agreement.
sentences.cn: 税率比起较为宽松的北美协议更糟。

sentences.en: Japan is getting heavy-handed in its crackdown on smoking.
sentences.cn: 日本正加大对吸烟的打击力度。

sentences.en: But heavy-handed regulators and compliance officers are forever reacting to the last disaster.
sentences.cn: 但严厉的监管者及合规官员总是在最后一场灾难降临时才做出反应。
